TopicTitle: The Korion Multi Purpose Kerbal Spacecraft

Articles.Content:
This is a kerbal versoin of the Orion crew capsle, enjoy.

The first screenshot is the description. The second is the craft in the VAB. The third is it in orbit. And the last is the duna injection burn, there is no duna sceenshots because i goofed up the burn and i didnt want to do it agian, but I know it has the Delta-V to get to duna,orbit,and deorbit. Infact the first stage has around 2 km/s of Delta-V in the first stage. The only mods i used was kerbal enginer to make the best ingine choise. Peblorian if you are reading this put these screenshots in your next episode because I know you would like more things to showcase in your videos.
Sorry I am new and i must have not put in the imige thingies right can someone help me? ill try agian:

Hey Titan, your pictures are not working and here's why, you need to go to imgur.com and upload the photos there into an album. From there you can take the link for a picture to properly post on a forum in order to display the image. I hope this helps I really want to see this craft.
Info on how to post imgur albums. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums!
Korion? The K syndrome is getting old already. Please stop.
